text: @npalmerrothman @therealJFKFAN Tragic. 😢 Meanwhile in SC, Gov. @henrymcmaster is sentencing his state's citizens to death by reopening flea markets and other major retailers BEFORE we've hit our peak. Gawd help us. #COVID19 #StayatHome
